text: @PressSec @RedCali2020 @realDonaldTrump US per capita testing numbers: 9,845 per 1M citizens. There are 5 COUNTRIES just on the below list ALONE with better numbers than we have!! If our performance was impressive you wouldn’t have to bullshit. #COVID19 https://t.co/pwTNcaCGUs
